page.title: 18SHOTESHAM/HOWE EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {TRADE}Shops in the area are a part_time Post Office, 4 mornings a week, and a Butchers, which sells meat, poultry, game and a small assortment of groceries. Local Businesses include 2 Undertaker/Builders, a Lithographic Printer, an Antique Clock Repairer and a Car Servising Garage. { {UNEMPLOYMENT}is low, a few school leavers being absorbed locally, others travelling to Norwich. A few young men have become self_employed. A source of part_time employment for women is Domestic Help and for men Gardening. { {CONSUMER AFFAIRS}The Shotesham Parish Council usually donates Â£20 p.a. to the Citizens Advice Bureau, Norwich.
